Description: Heavy maintenance tool repurposed as a bludgeon. Slow but devastating.
Electrified security baton. Fast attacks with a chance to stun.
Mountaineering axe scavenged from frozen exterior. Armor-piercing.
Improvised ranged weapon powered by train boiler pressure.
Welded scrap metal plates offering basic torso protection.
Reinforced maintenance suit with cold and impact resistance.
Threadbare clothing from the tail section. Minimal protection.
Adrenaline injection. Temporarily boosts speed and stamina.
Field surgery supplies. Restores 50 health over 10 seconds.
Industrial heating compound. Reduces cold damage for 60 seconds.
Heavy brass key granting access to the Eternal Engine core.
Salvaged metal fragments useful for repairs and crafting.
Bundle of electrical wires for circuit repair.
